dt-option.name: columns.dataSort
dt-option.summary: Define multiple column sorting as the default sort for a column

type.description: A single column index to sort upon
Multiple column indexes to define multi-column sorting

dt-option.default: Takes the index value of the column automatically
dt-option.description:
Allows a column's sorting to take multiple columns into account when doing a sort.
For example with first name / last name columns next to each other, it is intuitive that they would be linked together to multi-column sort.

example.title: Using `dataSort` to define multi-column sorting with `dt-init columnDefs`
Using `dataSort` to define multi-column sorting with `dt-init columns`
